subject: Football
Tests (Drug Use)
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. and the players union have been in a standoff almost since they agreed in the new collective bargaining agreement to begin blood-testing for H.G.H. this season.
snippet: The N.F.L. and the players union have been in a standoff almost since they agreed in the new collective bargaining agreement to begin blood-testing for H.G.H. this season.
